title: Smartphone user penetration in Argentina 2017 to 2023
summary: This statistic gives information on the mobile internet penetration in brazil from 2017 to 2023 . In 2017 , 41 percent of the Brazilian population accessed internet from their mobile device . This figure is expected to grow to 51 percent in 2023 .
gold: The statistic shows the smartphone user penetration in Argentina as share of the population from 2017 to 2023 . In 2018 , 52 percent of the population in Argentina used a smartphone .
